sub-events.comment: Create A Helper Triggerzone so we can Force a Trigger to be Called in a Function.
Tests a Triggers conditions and returns 0 or 1 based if they are true of false.

if this triggerzone is a complexTriggerzone then we need to loop through all of its functions and test there conditions to see if they are true and if they are we test to see if the TriggeredBy Condition is true and if it is then we call teh function
Setting the Triggerzones bit to 0 makes it so it can be triggered again without walking off of it
IF the Player is not Overlaping the trigger Then we need to set its collisions to 0.
